# Marche Innovattion Website Project

## Project Status
- [x] Created copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffolded Next.js project
- [x] Installed dependencies
- [x] Created components and pages
- [x] Added styling and animations
- [x] Tested and verified build

## Project Overview
Enterprise-grade website for Marche Innovattion - a medical and engineering equipment innovation company.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Framer Motion
- React Icons

## Development Notes
- Professional, enterprise-level design
- Dark/light theme support
- Fully responsive
- SEO optimized
- Production-ready
